cssmin.class.php
	cssmin
	v1.0
	MIT License
	cssmin reduces the size of stylesheet definitions by removing all unneeded whitespaces and comments.
	http://code.google.com/p/cssmin/

JSMin.class.php
	jsmin
	v1.1.1
	MIT License
	PHP port of Douglas Crockford's JSMin JavaScript minifier
	http://code.google.com/p/jsmin-php/


Twig/
	Twig
	v0.9.4
	3-Clause BSD
	Templating library
	http://www.twig-project.org/

HTMLPurifier/
	HTMLPurifier
	v4.0.0
	LGPL
	Standards-compliant HTML filter, filters out XSS.
	http://htmlpurifier.org/
